resources.string: flaticon is a free project, created for and by designers and developers. \n\nThanks for the table and card icons!
Subtle Patterns is created and curated by Atle Mo. His goal is to be a high quality resource for anyone in need of tilable textured patterns, free to use.
ChunkFive font was used in the icon for Deck.
The flipping animation used with the playing cards was originally created by William J. Francis. They\'ve been slightly modified for this app.
